Description: Italian coffee drink that is traditionally prepared with double espresso, hot milk, and steamed milk foam
Sweet chocolate drink made with hot milk or water, and powder containing chocolate, sugar, and powdered milk
Coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans
Blended coffee beverages developed and sold by Starbucks who have trademarked the name. It is an iced or chilled cappuccino that may be topped with whipped cream
Espresso (served in a demitasse cup) with a small amount of foamed milk on top
Aromatic beverage commonly prepared by pouring hot or boiling water over cured leaves of the Camellia sinensis
